Articles.Content:
My Challenge is, to launch a vessel from the launchpad or the runway, whichever you prefer, take it to Low-Kerbin-Orbit (Every orbit with periapsis over 70km), and it has to have the capability of docking to a station.

Rules:

-What is considered the Cost of the mission is the amount of funs you have to pay for the whole vessel minus the recovered stage

-You're only allowed to recover one piece (meaning, only one Structure of connected parts)

-No infinity gliders

-No Ladderpowerd spacecraft

-No Bugusing

-No mods except for MechJeb (you still have to fly the mission yourself) or KerbalEngeneer

-No Xenon Propulsion (would have been very expensive anyway)

Score:

-10 points for reaching orbit with docking-capability

-1 point for Vessel cost <25k

-2 points for Vessel cost <20k

-3 points for Vessel cost <15k

-5 points for Vessel cost <10k

-10 points for Vessel cost <5k

-5 points for SSTOs. (Except for the payload, for example booster plus rcs powered probe)

-small docking port = +1point

-medium docking port = +3points

-large docking port = +5points

-5 points for manned Vessels

-2 points per additional kerbal aboard

-4 points for probe core/commandpod/Kerbal back to kerbin safely

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have fun doing this rather simple challenge!
does it need to have any specific payload capacity, or just the docking port?
Well it needs to be able to dock and therefore have a commanpod/probecore. But you just need that, not more.

My multiengine tutorial example spaceplane

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102182-So-you-want-to-build-a-space-plane-%28-25-stock%29

would net

10 points for orbit & dock =10

10 points for cost < 5k =10 (assuming I understand the rules correctly)

5 points for SSTO =5

3 points for medium docking port =3

5 points for manned =5

2 points per extra kerbal x25 =50

4 points for safe return =4

87 points.

Best,

-Slashy

My 1 million fund how-to-do-challenges tutorial example rocket

Javascript is disabled. View full album

would net

-10 points for reaching orbit with docking-capability

-large docking port = +5points

-5 points for manned Vessels

-2 points per additional kerbal aboard X432

884 Points.

Best

-Chen
